item.description: Experienced IT Business Analyst Passionate Project Manager Dedicated Product Owner Movie Lover My Skill Business Analysis Project Management Product Management Agile Team Management SQL ½| |*Agile Team Management* | | | | | |⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ --

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY IT Business analyst with 5 years’ experience focused on Agile project management, product management, database systems, business intelligence, data analysis & production support 4+ years’ experience leading & managing engineering teams & products 4+ years’ experience in project management, requirements - gathering & project analysis 4+ years’ experience initiating, managing & leading projects in IT, Merchandising & Marketing 4+ years’ experience with T-SQL & PL-SQL programming 2 years’ experience in Microservices architecture, RESTful API design, server-side web development, Google Cloud Pub/Sub, AWS SQS/SNS, e-commerce server-side programming & JSON TOOLS AND TECHNOLOGIES Business Analysis: Technical and functional requirements gathering, business process modeling & improvement, functional and technical requirement documentation, financial ROI analysis, user story writing, digital product management, UX collaboration, project initiation & lifecycle management Tools: Jira, Confluence, GitHub, MS SQL Server, Oracle DB, AWS SQS/SNS, Google Cloud, MS Azure, Oracle ATG, MongoDB, MS Excel, MS TFS, MS Visual Studio, MS PowerBI, Splunk, ElasticSearch & Relate CRM Methodologies: Agile, SCRUM, Kanban, Waterfall & SDLC Data Modeling: FACT/Dimension tables, Snowflake/Star schemas, SQL index/table design & KPI/Report Dashboard design PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE URBN Philadelphia, PA
